title: Weekend Blossom ~ Colorful Winter Blooms
content:
Summer is just round the corner in our part of the world. Our garden is bursting with colorful blooms this winter season. Its been a while since I've shared some garden pictures with my dear readers. I've captured a few pictures to share with you all. :)

Desert Rose - Deep Pink Petunia

Nandivardhanam - White Zerbera

Firecracker - Orange Zerbera

Blue Petunia - Floss flower

Dianthus China Pink - White Red Petunia

Yellow Buttercups - Chestnutleaf Trumpetbush

Dianthus - Deep pink Zerbera

Amazon lily - Dianthus

Pink Anthurium - Pink Petunia

Periwinkle - Garden Stock

Dianthus flowers
